00020 struct RailsConfig {
00021         /** The base URI at which the Rails application operates. */
00022         const char *base_uri;
00023         /** The same as base_uri, but with a trailing slash. This is to make matching URIs easier. */
00024         char *base_uri_with_slash;
00025         /** The environment (i.e. value for RAILS_ENV) under which the Rails application should operate. */
00026         const char *env;
00027 };
